Subject: Issue with Invoice

Write to us about a discrepancy in the invoice regarding several technical products You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. The issue arose recently from expired subscriptions. Despite efforts to verify transactions and claim support, the problem remains unresolved. We look forward to addressing this soon and offering a solution. Please inform us if additional information is needed to proceed. My name is Liu Wei.
